item.title: MS13-013: Vulnerabilities in FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint parsing could allow remote code execution: February 12, 2013
item.description: Resolves vulnerabilities in Microsoft FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint when the Advanced Filter Pack is enabled that could allow remote code execution in the security context of a user account that uses a restricted token.

item.title: MS12-067: Vulnerability in FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint parsing could allow remote code execution: October 9, 2012
item.description: Resolves vulnerabilities in Microsoft FAST Search Server 2010 for SharePoint when the Advanced Filter Pack is enabled that could allow remote code execution in the security context of a user account that uses a restricted token.
